website_summaries.verdict: Reasonable price point for a basic kayak. Adequate room for larger adults.
pros: Room for one person and a dog
Easy for one person to carry with lightweight design
cons: Doesn't work as well in rough waters
Will need to purchase cushion for hard plastic seat

customer_reviews.title: Great kayak, must be home for delivery
customer_reviews.text: Really great kayak, big enough easily for me and my dog. Delivery from Amazon is a freight style delivery. They give you a 5 hour window and an adult has to be present to sign for it.
customer_reviews.author: DrowsyKitten

customer_reviews.title: This is my first kayak and I absolutely love it. I have taken it out on the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my first kayak and I absolutely love it. I have taken it out on the local town lake and it is fantastic!!!
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: fun & stable
customer_reviews.text: it came with a gouge on the side, but it is a lot of fun for the money
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Vapor 10
customer_reviews.text: Fast, dependable. Great kayak for heavier folks, which is why I purchased it (245#).
customer_reviews.author: K. F.

customer_reviews.title: Great kayak! There is more than enough room for ...
customer_reviews.text: Great kayak! There is more than enough room for storage and to stretch your legs out. It weighs 48 pounds but it feels like it weights nothing when it's in the water. It's really stable and tracks perfectly. I tried to tip it in a lake without standing up just to see if I could and it didn't capsize. The seat and foot rests are adjustable and very comfortable. The quality of this kayak is way above the price I bought it for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Old Towne Vapor 10 Kayak (Sunrise)
customer_reviews.text: Love this Kayak. Used it for the first time just last week. It tracks really well and for a good size guy it works really well for me. Definitely recommend this kayak for the bigger guys above 250. Plenty of room for entry and exit and has space to carry that 6-pack!
customer_reviews.author: Holty

customer_reviews.title: It is very stable and easy to paddle
customer_reviews.text: This is my first kayak. It is very stable and easy to paddle. The seat back is a little too short for me. It tends to hit the edge of my life jacket, but that is not too bad. I like how I can get into really shallow water with it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Teresa Ervin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really good.. Can't wait to get it into the water.
customer_reviews.author: John Ben Jr

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect kayak for the lake. It's a nice toodeling boat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easily! I have kayaked many lakes
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kayak a couple years ago. I wanted to be able to use this by myself... Nobody help me! I put it inside my 2001'Honda CR-V... Easily! I have kayaked many lakes, mostly, Lake Tahoe, and I have to say this kayak fits the bill! Easy to use and maneuver. I love this boat of mine!!! I am a 53 year old woman and can do this myself!! Yay me!!
customer_reviews.author: Alan Rosen

customer_reviews.title: stability
customer_reviews.text: Really great kayak for a starter but with experience you want more maneuverability. Was fishing on the Hedonista Lagoon, got caught in outgoing tide and could not turn quick enough to avoid crashing into the chain barrier just past the railroad bridge. Impact upended the boat and dumped me headfirst into the water. Had to be rescued because was not wearing a life jacket. Learned a good lesson about kayak stability. Wear a life jacket always!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tracking could be better
customer_reviews.text: I do love it for the most part but being a 10' kayak does effect tracking some. The 12 will probably tract better. Its stable. If you want a full skirt for it the Seals Sneak Nylon Skirt size 7.0 is the way to go. I would recommend this product. One more thing....Old Town was smoking crack when they installed the drain plug. Its very difficult to drain from where they put it. I wet vaccummed mine out once i got home.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift came in on time.
customer_reviews.text: Came in on time, a little banged up looks like from shipping, works fine, loving the color
customer_reviews.author: MegLove

product_meta.title: Old Town Canoes & Kayaks Vapor 10 Recreational Kayak, Sunrise
product_meta.description: Perfect for anglers, sportsmen, and recreational paddlers alike, the Old Town Vapor 10 Recreational Kayak's single-layer polyethylene hull and a large cockpit opening provide a comfortable and reassuring ride. An adjustable Comfort Flex seat and easy-grip thigh pads keep paddlers comfortable for a full day out on the water. Packed with features, the Vapor 10 includes a molded-in cockpit tray with cup holder, a molded-in paddle rest, stern day-well for storing gear, built-in carry handles, a drain plug, skid plate, and more. Enjoy a stable and efficient ride with the added leverage and control of the Vapor 10's Glide Track foot brace system. This ten-foot kayak has an impressive 325-pound maximum load capacity and features a limited lifetime warranty. Paddle sold separately. Old Town is the world's oldest and largest manufacturer of canoes and kayaks. The company has spent over a century innovating—boat after boat, all while staying true to their Northeast heritage and a long legacy of quality craftsmanship.
feature_bullets: Perfect for anglers, sportsmen, and recreational paddlers alike, the Old Town Vapor 10 Recreational Kayak's single-layer polyethylene hull and a large cockpit opening provide a comfortable and reassuring ride.
An adjustable Comfort Flex seat and easy-grip thigh pads keep paddlers comfortable for a full day out on the water.

Packed with features, the Vapor 10 includes a molded-in cockpit tray with cup holder, a molded-in paddle rest, stern day-well for storing gear, built-in carry handles, a drain plug, skid plate, and more.
Enjoy a stable and efficient ride with the added leverage and control of the Vapor 10's Glide Track foot brace system.
This ten-foot kayak has an impressive 325-pound maximum load capacity and features a limited lifetime warranty. Paddle sold separately.

Old Town is the world's oldest and largest manufacturer of canoes and kayaks. The company has spent over a century innovating—boat after boat, all while staying true to their Northeast heritage and a long legacy of quality craftsmanship.
